    • login

      public static boolean login​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Verifies the given credentials. Populates the token object to be used for future database requests
      Parameters:
      email - the email to be checked
      password - the password to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the user is valid, false otherwise
